p: In the Probate Court of Whitman County Washington Territory before WN Ruby Probate Judge
In the matter of Amos Gustin and Catherine Gustin adopting Daisy Geneva Departte minor child of James C Departte and Elizabeth Departte

The petition of Amos &Catherine Gustin this cause came in to be heard in open court held at in Whitman County Wash T on January 24th 1888 at the regular term of said court the petition of Amos Gustin and Catherine Gustin for leave to adopt Daisy Geneva Departte a minor child not their by birth and for change of name and it appearing to the court after examining said petitioners on oath that said Amos Gustin and Catherine Gustin are husband and wife and inhabitants of Washington Territory and residing in Whitman County Washington Territory and of adopting said Daisy Geneva Departte and it further appearing that said Daisy Geneva Departte was a minor child not three years of age and had no legal guardian and had been abadoned by her parents James Departte and Elizabeth Departte thereupon the court appointed SJ Chadwick a decent and suitable person to act in the proceedings as the next friend of said minor child and it further appearing that the said SJ Chadwick after an examination of the proceedings and parties lawful to have said petitioiners adopt said child and had given his written consent to said adoption and it further appearing to the court upon
an examination of Catherin Gustin separate and appart from her husband Amos Gustin that she of her own free will and allone desired said adoption to adopt said Daisy Genevea Departte and it further appearing that the said petitioners and the court being fully satisfied of the ability of the aforesaid petitioners to bring up and educate said Daisy Geneva Departte properly and also of the fulness and properett of such adoption

It is therfore ordered that from this date towel January 24th 1888 said minor child Daisy Geneva Departte to all legal intents and purposes is the child of said petitioners Amos Gustin and Catherine Gustin and that the name of said child is hereby changed from Daisy Geneva Departte to Daisy Geneva Gustin
Done in open court January 24th AD 1888
In the matter of the adoption of Daisy Geneva Departte
Clerk of Probate Court of Whitman
WmH Furman and Mark A Fullerton Atty for Defendant
